name: Retail Mini Pack
white_cards: A teenage boy gunning for a handjob.
Feeding a man a pie made of his own children.
Ironically buying a trucker hat and then ironically being a trucker for 38 years.

black_cards.text: How are the writers of Cards Against Humanity spending your $25?
Looking to earn big bucks? Learn how to make _____ work for you!
